title: Exquisite Peacock Motif Diamond Choker - A Modern Haaram
materials: featuring meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds and a vibrant Rubellite center stone. Accented with mixed gemstones. Finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This unique choker showcases an asymmetrical design with a delicate floral motif on one side and a majestic peacock motif on the other. The peacock is embellished with intricately placed Rubellite, diamonds and mixed gemstones to enhance its vibrant colours. The floral motif shows a combination of different gold tone metals. The design blends traditional South Indian artistry with a modern choker silhouette.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white diamonds. Accented with shades of Rubellite
brown and yellow gemstones to accentuate the peacock's feathers. The gold has a warm
inviting tone enhanced by the Hyderabadi Polish.
occasions: and high-end parties. Adds a touch of sophisticated elegance to any contemporary or semi-traditional outfit. Can also be worn for special family functions to signify tradition with a modern twist.
description: A stunning blend of contemporary design and traditional South Indian motifs. The unique asymmetrical design and vibrant gemstone accents make this choker a true statement piece.
